Key Match Events: The Cleveland Cavaliers secured a 41-point lead in the first half with a score of 83-42.
Steph Curry was held down by the Cavs as he was held down to 12 points and 25% accuracy from beyond the arc.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cleveland Cavaliers are now 10-0 in their season.
This was only the second defeat of the season for the Golden State Warriors.
Others: Jonathan Kuminga had a great game, putting up 21 points, six rebounds, and five assists.
